attributes.action: Put a food bank in airports
attributes.additional_details: As whenever I go on holiday, we buy a bunch of food and majority ends up not eaten and having to be thrown in the bin. I was thinking I would love if I could donate it somewhere and potentially if England started implementing food banks at airports other airports could follow and hopefully help less fortunate people.
attributes.background: Put a food bank in airports so when people leave they can donate food instead of binning it and wasting food that could be beneficial to someone.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about whether to have food donation points are a matter for individual businesses, not the UK Government or Parliament.
